head.supplied: The ¶ Tasmanian Union Jack Field Club. ¶ This is to certify that ¶ Baron Von Mueller K.C.M.G. etc ¶ was duly elected a Honorary Member of the "The Tasmanian Union Jack Field Club," on the ¶ 9th ¶ ...

div.p: From the Tasmanian Union Jack Field Club
RB MSS M199, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: This is to certify that Baron Von Mueller K.C.M.G. etc was duly elected a Honorary Member of the "The Tasmanian Union Jack Field Club," on the 9th day of July in the year of our Lord 1884 and is duly entitled to the above honor.

note.p: Not all signatories have been identified; those who have been are listed in the Biographical Register.
